CustomField.description: This step requires an understanding of all the stakeholders involved in buying Grafana.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A score of 0 means we don't yet know all of the stakeholders in the decision process. A score of 1 means we know some of the stakeholders. A score of 2 means we know all the stakeholders in the decision process and we've met with them.
CustomField.label: Decision Process Score
